value.title: "Flying dragon" robot harnesses the "crazy hose" effect to fight fires
value.excerpt: Japanese researchers have created and open-sourced a flying firefighting hose that levitates and steers itself to fight fires using its own water pressure as a two-part propulsion system, spraying water down onto fires and keeping operators safe.
